page.title: 06POLEGATE LIBRARY
page.content: POLEGATE LIBRARY WAS BUILT IN 1968.IT WAS FIRST CATEGORISED IN JANUARY 1984.THE FIRST LIBRARIAN WAS MISS VERA HODSOLL. AM PM MON/TUE 10-1.00 2-5.00 WED 10-1.00 CLOSED THU CLOSED ALL DAY FRI 10-1.00 2-7.00 SAT 9.30-1.00 2-5.00 THERE ARE SIX STAFF IN POLEGATE LIBRARY. FRIDAY IS THE MOST POPULAR DAY BECAUSE THEY ARE CLOSED FOR 1.5 DAYS. THE PEOPLE WHO USE THE LIBRARY ARE MAINLY RETIRED. A PERSON CAN GET THE BOOK THEY WANT BY USING THE MICRO FICHE. THE MOST POPULAR BOOKS - CRIME NOVELS. POLEGATE LIBRARY HAS A SMALL REFERENCE SECTION,DIRECTORIES,LOCAL GOVERNMENT PLANS,HOUSE BOUND SERVICE etc.
